title: NZ & Aussie players join here
body:
We are a bunch of New Zealand and Australia players who love to play league.

we have teamspeak sever setup, you can make private channels if needed, the teamspeak is free to use for anyone and any game.

we have around 10-15 players playing league most of the time online with a mixed bunch of players from bronze to platinum.

come join us on ts have a laugh, a game or maybe learn a thing or too.


IP: ts36.gameservers.com:9367

replies.body: hey will you accept a lvl 15?
